messages.subject: big kids out and about
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/13/2004 7:55:34 PM Mountain Daylight Time, cinsurf@yahoo.com writes: I feel for you Sandra. If it were me, I imagine I would have the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/13/2004 7:55:34 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
cinsurf@... writes:
I feel for you Sandra. If it were me, I imagine I would have
the broken record of 'I wonder what they're doing right now, I hope
they're OK' playing in my head.
=======

I've gone a couple of hours at a time without wondering, but when I do look
at the clock I wonder and hope. They're to be back between 11:00 pm and 4:00
a.m.ish, depending whether any of the seven are in the final rounds. They
travelled in one van, one parental adult, two young unmarried adults, the rest
teens, Marty the youngest.


Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
